sentences.en: She crammed her mouth with caviar.
Lloyd had urged her to eat caviar. She had shuddered at the thought.
sentences.cn: 劳埃德已鼓动她吃鱼子酱。可她一想到这个就打哆嗦了。

sentences.en: At Fortnum's, you'll find the finest caviar, cheeses, fresh fruit, veg, fish, poultry and meats, as well as a huge range of teas and, of course, marmalade!
sentences.cn: 在福特纳姆梅森百货，你可以找到上好的鱼子酱、奶酪、新鲜水果、蔬菜、鱼、家禽、肉类以及种类繁多的茶叶，当然还有，果酱！
